system.description:
This wand will point toward any type of metal named if within 20' and if 1,000 gp or more in weight. The user cannot detect the amount of metal.

The effect will remain as long as the caster concentrates. Moving, taking damage, or failing a Saving Throw results in the concentration breaking and the effect ending.
system.unidentifiedDesc: A slim, smoothly finished stick about 18" (45 cm) long, the wand fits comfortably in one hand. Its surface shows faint runes and hairline veins; one end tapers to a rounded tip while the other terminates in a small carved motif. It feels surprisingly light and balanced.
